test_cases.Title: Abbreviations_Definitions_001_Documentation_TEST_Desktop_Verifying inclusion of abbreviations in the definitions section

Steps.Step Description: Open the documentation containing the definitions and abbreviations section.
Steps.Expected Result: The documentation is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the table of abbreviations.
Steps.Expected Result: The table of abbreviations is present.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the following abbreviations are present: SE, RU, RF, US, FE/BE, APP SEG, APP SEVV.
Steps.Expected Result: All specified abbreviations are listed in the table.

test_cases.Preconditions: The documentation must be available and accessible.
test_cases.Expected Result: The definitions and abbreviations section includes all specified abbreviations.
test_cases._polarion: Definizioni e abbreviazioni
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the presence of abbreviations in the document.

test_cases.Title: Use Case_Definitions_002_Overview_TEST_Desktop_Verifying use case definitions in the software documentation

Steps.Step Description: Open the software documentation.
Steps.Expected Result: The documentation interface is shown.

Steps.Step Description: Search for the section that discusses 'Use Cases'.
Steps.Expected Result: Use Cases section is found in the documentation.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that all relevant use cases are defined.
Steps.Expected Result: The documentation lists all pertinent use cases accurately.

test_cases.Preconditions: The documentation must be available and correctly formatted.
test_cases.Expected Result: All relevant use cases are well-defined in the documentation.
test_cases._polarion: Definizioni e abbreviazioni
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the presence of use case definitions.

test_cases.Title: Functional Requirements_Definitions_003_Validation_TEST_Desktop_Verifying functional requirements in software documentation

Steps.Step Description: Open the documentation with functional requirements.
Steps.Expected Result: The functional requirements section of the documentation is visible.

Steps.Step Description: Locate and access the functional requirements subsection.
Steps.Expected Result: Functional requirements subsection is available.

Steps.Step Description: Review the functional requirements for completeness and clarity.
Steps.Expected Result: All functional requirements are clearly stated and complete.

test_cases.Preconditions: The documentation with functional requirements must be available.
test_cases.Expected Result: The functional requirements section includes all relevant details and is clear.
test_cases._polarion: Definizioni e abbreviazioni
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only validates presence and clarity of functional requirements.

test_cases.Title: general_description_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the general description page of the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The general description page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the title 'Descrizione generale' is present on the page.
Steps.Expected Result: The title 'Descrizione generale' is displayed correctly on the page.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully views the general description page with correct title.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the visibility of the general description rather than content verification.

test_cases.Title: invalid_navigation_general_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to navigate to the general description page using an invalid URL.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating the page cannot be found.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is on a different section of the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: User receives a 404 error message.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests error handling on navigating to invalid URLs, not other navigation methods.

test_cases.Title: access_rights_general_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in with a user that has restricted access.
Steps.Expected Result: User is restricted from accessing the general description page.

Steps.Step Description: Try to access the general description page.
Steps.Expected Result: User is presented with an access denied message.

test_cases.Preconditions: User with restricted rights is logged into the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: Access denied message appears, preventing view of general description page.
test_cases._polarion: Descrizione generale
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates access rights, but does not check general description content.

test_cases.Title: AI Angel Numera Integration_Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Launch the GNTN Game Client application.
Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN Game Client application opens and is fully loaded.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'AI Angel Numera' feature section within the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'AI Angel Numera' feature section is displayed to the user.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the creation of a new combination using 'AI Angel Numera'.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI assistant prompts the user for input to proceed with the combination creation.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the GNTN Game Client installed and be logged into their account.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can successfully initiate the combination creation with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases._polarion: Scopo ed ambito di applicazione
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the initiation of combination creation; further behavior of AI assistant not included.

test_cases.Title: AI Angel Numera Feedback_Response_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Begin the combination creation process using 'AI Angel Numera'.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is prompted to provide input for the combination.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a valid input as per game rules and confirm the request.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera processes the input and generates a combination.

Steps.Step Description: Review the AI-generated combination displayed on the screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The generated combination appears accurately and meets the game's criteria.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have accessed the 'AI Angel Numera' feature.
test_cases.Expected Result: User receives the correct AI-generated combination.
test_cases._polarion: Scopo ed ambito di applicazione
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only AI feedback responsiveness; user interaction continuity is not tested.

test_cases.Title: Integration_GNTN_Vivocha_001_Functionality_TEST_Desktop_Verifying integration between GNTN and Vivocha AI

Steps.Step Description: Access the GNTN game client.
Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN game client is successfully launched.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the integration with Vivocha AI Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The integration process starts without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor the interaction logs between GNTN and Vivocha AI.
Steps.Expected Result: Logs show successful data exchanges between systems.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the GNTN game client and the Vivocha integration setup.
test_cases.Expected Result: Integration between GNTN and Vivocha AI is successfully verified.
test_cases._polarion: Relazioni con altri sistemi
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the initiation and monitoring of integration; error handling not included.

test_cases.Title: External Interaction_001_Functionality_TEST_Mobile_Verifying external system interactions remain AS IS

Steps.Step Description: Launch the GNTN mobile application.
Steps.Expected Result: The GNTN mobile application opens without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Trigger interactions with external systems currently in place.
Steps.Expected Result: All external interactions function as originally set (AS IS).

Steps.Step Description: Validate the responses from the external systems.
Steps.Expected Result: Responses are accurate and reflect the current setup without changes.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have the GNTN mobile app installed and operational.
test_cases.Expected Result: External interactions remain unchanged and function as expected.
test_cases._polarion: Relazioni con altri sistemi
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests only the interaction aspect; does not cover performance or error tracking.

Steps.Expected Result: The section is labeled 'General Limitations'.

Steps.Expected Result: The content should state 'NA', indicating no specific general limitations.

test_cases.Title: AI_Angel_Numera_001_Client_GNTN_TEST_Mobile_Validate AI Angel Numera functionality in the Client

Steps.Expected Result: The application launches without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Follow the onboarding steps provided in the modal.
Steps.Expected Result: User can navigate through the onboarding steps smoothly.

Steps.Step Description: Close the onboarding modal after completion.

test_cases.Title: Chat_Display_LoggedIn_User_001_CHAT_Functionality_Test_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application as a logged-in user.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is successfully logged in and the chat interface is displayed without any privacy banner.

test_cases.Expected Result: Chat is accessible, and there is no privacy banner displayed.

test_cases.Title: Chat_Display_LoggedOut_User_002_CHAT_Functionality_Test_Desktop

test_cases.Title: Privacy Link Click_XXX_PRIVACY_POLICY_HANDLE_TEST_Web_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the application and locate the privacy link in the banner.
Steps.Expected Result: The privacy link is visible and clickable.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the privacy link.
Steps.Expected Result: The application triggers the 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' message to the client.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in to the application and can see the banner.
test_cases.Expected Result: The client receives the 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' message when the privacy link is clicked.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the link click; does not verify the message reception by the client.

test_cases.Title: Privacy PostMessage Handling_XXX_PRIVACY_POLICY_POSTMESSAGE_TEST_Web_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Simulate receiving the 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' message from Vivocha.
Steps.Expected Result: The application registers that a message has been received.

Steps.Step Description: Check if the application sends a postMessage to its parent container.
Steps.Expected Result: The postMessage is sent with the appropriate URL to open the privacy policy.

test_cases.Preconditions: Client is prepared to receive messages from Vivocha.
test_cases.Expected Result: The postMessage successfully triggers the opening of the privacy policy document.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers sending postMessage; does not verify the actual opening of the document.

test_cases.Title: Privacy Document Opening_XXX_PRIVACY_POLICY_OPENING_TEST_Web_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application and click on the privacy link.
Steps.Expected Result: The application sends the 'CLICK_PRIVACY_INFO' message.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that a postMessage is sent with the URL to the privacy policy.
Steps.Expected Result: The content must be the correct URL for the privacy policy.

Steps.Step Description: Access the URL provided in the postMessage.
Steps.Expected Result: The privacy policy document is displayed correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in and can see the privacy link.
test_cases.Expected Result: User successfully opens and views the privacy policy document.
test_cases._polarion: Gestione link privacy
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the opening of the document; functionality of the document itself is not included.

test_cases.Title: postMessage_privacy_policy_link_XXX_RF5_Web_FULL_RESPONSIVE_TEST_Desktop_Test link opening privacy policy

Steps.Step Description: Open the desktop version of the web portal.
Steps.Expected Result: The web portal is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate receiving a postMessage with a URL to the privacy policy.
Steps.Expected Result: The system accepts the postMessage and prepares to open the URL.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the action to open the privacy policy link.
Steps.Expected Result: The privacy policy document opens in a new tab.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the URL of the opened privacy policy document.
Steps.Expected Result: The URL matches the expected privacy policy link.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the web portal.
test_cases.Expected Result: Privacy policy document opens correctly without errors.
test_cases._polarion: RF5 – Impatti Portale Web Full Responsive
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers the opening link functionality; does not include checks for content validity.

test_cases.Title: Analytics Tracking_Client_Test_Desktop_Verifying analytics tracking on the Game Client

Steps.Step Description: Launch the Game Client application.
Steps.Expected Result: The Game Client successfully opens.

Steps.Step Description: Login using valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is logged in and the main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Perform an in-game action (e.g., completing a level).
Steps.Expected Result: The action is executed without errors, and analytics tracking initiates.

Steps.Step Description: Check if the correct analytics event was sent.
Steps.Expected Result: The analytics dashboard reflects the game action taken.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has valid login credentials and the Game Client is installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: Analytics event is successfully tracked and logged.
test_cases._polarion: Analisi della specifica non funzionale – tracciamenti analytics
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the tracking of in-game actions; other events not tested.

test_cases.Title: Analytics Tracking_WebPortal_Test_Web_Verifying analytics tracking on the Web Portal

Steps.Step Description: Open the Web Portal in a browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The Web Portal loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Login with valid user credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and navigated to the homepage.

Steps.Step Description: Perform a user action (e.g., clicking on a promotional banner).
Steps.Expected Result: The action is executed, and analytics tracking records the event.

Steps.Step Description: Check the analytics dashboard for the recorded event.
Steps.Expected Result: The dashboard shows the event corresponding to the user action taken.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has valid credentials and internet connectivity.
test_cases.Expected Result: Analytics event reflecting user action is accurately logged.
test_cases._polarion: Analisi della specifica non funzionale – tracciamenti analytics
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on user events; background analytics processes not covered.

Steps.Expected Result: The Use Cases section is displayed with a list of use cases.

Steps.Step Description: Select a specific use case to view.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected use case is displayed with all relevant details.

Steps.Expected Result: The application opens without any functional issues.

Steps.Expected Result: The Use Cases menu opens showing all available entries.

Steps.Step Description: Choose a use case to expand and review.

test_cases.Title: Use Case Synopsis_003_Functionality_TEST_Desktop_Purpose of Use Case Summary

Steps.Step Description: Launch the web application in a browser.
Steps.Expected Result: The web application loads and displays the homepage.

Steps.Expected Result: The Use Cases page opens showing all listed use cases.

test_cases.Title: FillEmptyCoupon_001_CaseUse1_FillingBlankCoupon_TEST_Desktop_UserInputsDreamsDescription

Steps.Step Description: Open the GNTN game client in coupon mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The coupon page is displayed with blank combinations available.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Find Numbers with Your Dreams' CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera activates and the chat window opens.

Steps.Step Description: Describe the user's dream in the chat window.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera responds with a generated combination.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Insert' button after receiving the combination.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination is sent to the GNTN game client.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the game client’s action.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window closes and the combination is inserted into the first available line of the coupon.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination must be available for filling.
test_cases.Expected Result: The first line of the coupon is filled with the AI-generated combination.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 1 - Compilazione schedina vuota (Happy flow)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the filling functionality; no validation checks for duplicate combinations.

test_cases.Title: InsertCombination_002_CaseUse1_FillingBlankCoupon_TEST_Mobile_UserClicksInsert

Steps.Step Description: Launch the GNTN application in coupon mode on a mobile device.
Steps.Expected Result: The mobile coupon interface is displayed with existing blank combinations.

Steps.Step Description: Tap on the 'Find Numbers with Your Dreams' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat interface opens with the AI Angel Numera instance initiated.

Steps.Step Description: Input the dream description in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera generates and displays a combination.

Steps.Step Description: Tap the 'Insert' button to send the generated combination to the GNTN game client.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message appears indicating the combination is sent.

Steps.Step Description: Check the first available line of the coupon.
Steps.Expected Result: The new combination is inserted into the available slot in the coupon.

test_cases.Preconditions: The app must be properly installed and at least one blank combination available.
test_cases.Expected Result: The combination from AI Angel Numera is successfully added to the coupon.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 1 - Compilazione schedina vuota (Happy flow)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on the insertion action; does not cover error handling for invalid inputs.

test_cases.Title: AI_Combinations_Insertion_001_USECASE_Insertion_TEST_Mobile_Desktop_Valid AI response inserts into empty combination

Steps.Step Description: User opens the game page in betting card mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page in betting card mode displays correctly.

Steps.Step Description: User fills in the first 4 combinations manually, randomly, or from favorites.
Steps.Expected Result: The first 4 combinations are logged into the betting card.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the 'Find the numbers with your dreams' CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: A request is sent to the AI Angel Numera.

Steps.Step Description: User describes their dream in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera responds with a combination.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the 'Insert' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination from AI is passed to the game client.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the game client inserts the new AI-provided combination into the first available line.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI-provided combination appears in the first available row of the betting card.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination must be empty/available in the betting card.
test_cases.Expected Result: Combination is successfully inserted into the betting card.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 2 – Compilazione schedina parzialmente valorizzata (da 1 a 8)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on inserting combinations; validation of AI combination accuracy is not covered.

test_cases.Title: AI_Combinations_Insertion_002_USECASE_Insertion_TEST_Mobile_Desktop_Edge case with no available space

Steps.Step Description: User opens the game page in betting card mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page in betting card mode displays correctly.

Steps.Step Description: User fills in 8 combinations forcibly leaving no empty slots.
Steps.Expected Result: All combinations slots appear filled.

Steps.Step Description: User attempts to click on the 'Insert' option after AI response.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message or alert indicates that no slots are available for insertion.

test_cases.Preconditions: Eight combinations must be filled, with no empty slots.
test_cases.Expected Result: Validated that the system prevents insertion when no available slot exists.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 2 – Compilazione schedina parzialmente valorizzata (da 1 a 8)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies error handling on full betting card; insertion logic is covered elsewhere.

test_cases.Title: AI_Combinations_Insertion_003_USECASE_Insertion_TEST_Mobile_Desktop_Valid AI response insert check

Steps.Step Description: User opens the game page in betting card mode with pre-filled combinations.
Steps.Expected Result: Game page initializes correctly with the currently held combinations.

Steps.Step Description: User describes a dream in the chat for prediction.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera delivers a valid combination.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the 'Insert' button.
Steps.Expected Result: Combination is sent from AI to the game client.

Steps.Step Description: Check the fifth row of the betting card.
Steps.Expected Result: Fifth row effectively contains the combination returned from the AI.

test_cases.Preconditions: Four combinations are predefined and an AI response is available.
test_cases.Expected Result: AI combination is successfully recorded in the fifth row.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 2 – Compilazione schedina parzialmente valorizzata (da 1 a 8)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses only on checking the process of insertion from AI; not covering user scenario preconditions.

test_cases.Title: Fill Sheet with Last Combination_001_USECASE_Integration_Sheet_TEST_Desktop_Verifying last combination is added to the sheet

Steps.Step Description: Open the game page in 'sheet' mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page is successfully loaded and displays the sheet interface.

Steps.Step Description: Manually fill the first 9 combinations with valid numbers.
Steps.Expected Result: The first 9 combination slots are filled correctly with the specified numbers.

Steps.Step Description: Click the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: A request is made to the AI Angel Numera and a chat window is initiated.

Steps.Step Description: Describe a dream in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera responds with a suggested combination.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Insert' button in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The combination from AI Angel Numera is sent to the game client.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the last combination is added to the first available row in the sheet.
Steps.Expected Result: The inserted combination appears in the first empty slot of the sheet.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination slot must be empty.
test_cases.Expected Result: The last combination provided by AI Angel Numera is successfully added to the sheet.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 3 – Compilazione schedina con ultima combinazione disponibile (9 compilate)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the addition of the last combination; no validation for input numbers.

test_cases.Title: Fill Sheet with Invalid Dream_002_USECASE_Integration_Sheet_TEST_Desktop_Verifying handling of invalid dream input

Steps.Step Description: Open the game page in 'sheet' mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game page is successfully loaded and displays the sheet interface.

Steps.Step Description: Manually fill the first 9 combinations with valid numbers.
Steps.Expected Result: The first 9 combination slots are filled correctly with the specified numbers.

Steps.Step Description: Click the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: A request is made to the AI Angel Numera and a chat window is initiated.

Steps.Step Description: Describe an invalid dream in the chat (e.g., gibberish text).
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera returns an error or clarification message.

Steps.Step Description: Try to click the 'Insert' button in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The system prevents the insertion due to invalid dream input.

test_cases.Preconditions: At least one combination slot must be empty.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system correctly handles the invalid dream input and does not add a combination to the sheet.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 3 – Compilazione schedina con ultima combinazione disponibile (9 compilate)
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only invalid dream handling; does not verify other user actions.

test_cases.Title: Schedina_Filled_Combinations_001_AI_Functionality_Hidden_TEST_Desktop_Page_Does_Not_Show_AI_CTA

Steps.Step Description: Open the SE gaming page in ticket mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The page is displayed with the ticket interface.

Steps.Step Description: Manually fill in all 10 combinations using either favorites or random selections.
Steps.Expected Result: All 10 combinations are displayed correctly on the ticket.

Steps.Step Description: Check if the AI Angel Numera CTA is hidden.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera CTA is not visible; only the 'Clear All' action is shown.

Steps.Step Description: Complete the payment process.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment completes successfully without any errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: All 10 combinations are filled.
test_cases.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera CTA is hidden and 'Clear All' is shown.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 4 – Schedina con tutte le combinazioni compilate
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests the visibility of AI functionalities but does not cover validation of the payment process.

test_cases.Title: Schedina_Clear_All_002_Client_Interaction_TEST_Desktop_Clearing_Ticket_Shows_Actions

Steps.Step Description: Open the SE gaming page in ticket mode with the filled combinations.
Steps.Expected Result: The page displays the filled ticket with combinations.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the 'Clear All' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is emptied, and all fast actions are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the state of the ticket after clearing.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket should be cleared and show only action options available.

test_cases.Preconditions: The ticket is filled and displayed on the page.
test_cases.Expected Result: All combinations are cleared and actions are shown appropriately.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 4 – Schedina con tutte le combinazioni compilate
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses primarily on clearing functionality; does not validate how combinations are filled.

test_cases.Title: resume_conversation_001_USECASE_Conversation_Recovery_TEST_Mobile_Recovery of conversation after payment step

Steps.Step Description: Open the game client in the scheduled mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client is displayed with the scheduled interface.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: The application initiates a call to the Vivocha scripts.

Steps.Step Description: Describe your dream in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: The AI Angel Numera provides a combination response.

Steps.Step Description: Minimize the chat and proceed to the next step by clicking 'Next'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat is minimized, and the user advances in the game.

Steps.Step Description: Return to the game page and click on 'Continue the conversation'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat resumes in the exact state it was left.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has initiated the Numera chat and has access to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: The user successfully resumes the chat with the AI Angel Numera.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 5 – Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio a step di pagamento
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers conversation recovery only; does not include validation of chat responses.

test_cases.Title: chat_state_persistence_002_USECASE_Conversation_Recovery_TEST_Desktop_Verifying chat state persistence after session switch

Steps.Step Description: Launch the game client on the desktop.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client interface is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Engage in a conversation with AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: User can interact with the AI without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Minimize the chat window and navigate to the payment step via CTA.
Steps.Expected Result: User proceeds to the payment step while the chat remains open.

Steps.Step Description: Return to the chat by clicking the 'Continue the conversation' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat resumes with all previous messages and state intact.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an active game session and is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: The AI conversation retains its state after returning from payment.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 5 – Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio a step di pagamento
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates only chat persistence; does not check for response accuracy.

test_cases.Title: chat_resume_001_USECASE_Conversation_Recovery_TEST_Mobile_iOS_user resumes conversation from another game mode

Steps.Step Description: User opens the SE game page in scheduling mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The SE game page loads and is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: User clicks on the CTA 'Find the numbers with your dreams'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat with AI Angel Numera initiates successfully.

Steps.Step Description: User describes their dream in the chat.
Steps.Expected Result: AI Angel Numera responds with a combination based on the user's description.

Steps.Step Description: User minimizes the chat and switches to a different game mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The current game mode changes while the chat remains minimized.

Steps.Step Description: User returns to the scheduling game page and clicks on 'Continue the conversation'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat resumes exactly where it was left, displaying the previous messages and AI responses.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has started the chat with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can successfully resume the conversation with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 6 - Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio ad altre modalità di gioco
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on resuming conversation; does not cover chat functionality when leaving the game.

test_cases.Title: chat_data_persistence_002_USECASE_Conversation_Recovery_TEST_Desktop_user switches modes and checks chat data persistence

Steps.Step Description: User launches the game client in desktop mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The game client starts successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: User initiates a conversation with AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat window opens and is ready for user input.

Steps.Step Description: User types a message and receives a response from AI Angel Numera.
Steps.Expected Result: The message is sent, and AI responds accordingly.

Steps.Step Description: User switches to a fast game mode from the selection bar.
Steps.Expected Result: The fast game mode is activated, and the chat window minimizes without closing.

Steps.Step Description: User returns to the desktop mode and clicks 'Continue the conversation'.
Steps.Expected Result: The chat resumes exactly where it was left, retaining all messages and AI responses without loss.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have initiated a chat with AI Angel Numera.
test_cases.Expected Result: Chat data is persisted correctly upon switching between game modes.
test_cases._polarion: Caso d'uso 6 - Ripresa della conversazione dopo passaggio ad altre modalità di gioco
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests data persistence; does not evaluate chat UI behavior after revival.
